item.title: Duck Typing
item.description: Just define the image URL in the content’s front matter, the featured image will be displayed as the background. For example: ---images:- https://picsum.photos/1024/768/?random---This is an array, you can set multiple urls, only the first url will be used. These images is also used in Twitter Cards and the Open Graph metadata.

item.title: Post With Featured Image
item.description: Just define the image URL in the content’s front matter, the featured image will be displayed as the background. For example: ---images:- https://picsum.photos/1024/768/?random---This is an array, you can set multiple urls, only the first url will be used. These images is also used in Twitter Cards and the Open Graph metadata.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi there, I’m a Software Architect and Cloud Native Engineer with 13 years of experience. I help our clients from different branches in their Digital Transformation and Cloud Native journey. I started my career as a developer working with different technologies, but focusing mainly on Java. During the time I was interested and working side by side on DevOps and System Administration matters, as I’m a Linux user and admin and was Network+ certified.
